How to use:
1. Find a quiet heavy bag.
2. Put on headphones.
3. Calibrate your microphone sensitivity.
4. Start a fight in the app.
5. Listen for punch commands.
6. Punch.
7. The microphone registers the sound of your punches.

Tips:
- Wear headphones to avoid sound feedback.
-The first slider gets more sensitive to the left. The second gets more sensitive to the right.
-Avoid any loud sounds other than punching, e.g. sneakers squeaking.
- If you are in a noisy environment with lots of other boxes, this won't work.

resources.string: This app calls out random boxing combinations and registers when your glove hits the heavy bag. To register the hit, the app uses the microphone to listen for the bang sound. If you don\'t grant microphone permissions, this app cannot function.\n\nPlease tap back, start over, and grant the microphone permission.

The audio detection of bag punches can be finicky. There simply isn't a way of differentiating between your punch and a loud punch by someone else next to you. Or a loud sneaker screech may be detected as a punch. If you want quality detection, there are $200 dollar sensors that go into the glove. However, there are things that you can do to improve the sound detection of punches:

1. Be in a quiet room by yourself.
2. Use head phones. The sound that the app creates will create a sound feedback loop to the app.
3. Use the sound calibration setting to tune the microphone on your phone.

Wonder what those numbers that the app yells mean? They are standardized references to specific punches.

1 = jab
2 = right hand
3 = left hook
4 = right hook (or overhand right)
5 = left uppercut
6 = right uppercut

For more information, see:
http://www.expertboxing.com/boxing-strategy/punch-combinations/johnnys-punching-combinations-list

Bag Zombie is a fitness app to make working out with a heavy bag more fun. It simulates an imaginary fight against the heavy bag by calling out punch combinations. The phone\'s microphone listens for punches to tell you the reaction time.\n\nIt\'s a heck of a lot more fun to react to something than to fight an inanimate heavy bag. Still the heavy bag won\'t fight back. It\'s pretty much like a zombie that\'ll take your punches, but now it\'s at least alive in a zombie way!
